meanings.sent1: I counted to threes before jumping.
meanings.sent2: She bought threes apples at the store.
meanings.sent3: The cat played with threes balls at once.
meanings.sent4: His threes wishes all came true.
meanings.sent5: The threes little pigs built different houses.

meanings.definition: A group or set of three people or things.
meanings.sent1: They formed threes to work on the project.
meanings.sent2: The children played in threes at the park.
meanings.sent3: The threes musketeers were always together.
meanings.sent4: The threes stooges made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent5: The threes primary colors mix to create new shades.

meanings.definition: The third in a set or sequence.
meanings.sent1: After the first two, the threes book was next.
meanings.sent2: She always sits in the threes row in class.
meanings.sent3: The threes car in line was red.
meanings.sent4: The threes chapter of the story was the most exciting.
meanings.sent5: The threes day of the week is Wednesday.
